CmdLine: export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive &&     echo " deb http://packages.elasticsearch.org/logstash/1.4/debian stable main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb.list &&     sudo apt-key adv --fetch-keys "http://packages.elasticsearch.org/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch" &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get -y install logstash logstash-contrib rinetd &&     rm /etc/s6/syslog/setup
Commands.Name: run
